mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.activity_name AS "activityName", a.activity_code AS "activityCode", a.send_time AS "sendTime", a.send_all AS "sendAll", a.send_scope AS "sendScope", a.activity_tools AS "activityTools", a.send_num AS "sendNum", a.integration_num AS "integrationNum", a.description AS "description", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", b.name as "createBy.name", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "status", a.send_status AS "sendStatus", a.u_version AS "uVersion", GROUP_CONCAT(c.user_id) AS officeIds
LEFT JOIN sys_user_activity c on c.activity_id = a.id and c.`status` = 1 LEFT join sys_user b on b.id = a.create_id and b.status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_integration_activity( id, activity_name, activity_code, send_time, send_scope, send_all, activity_tools, send_num, integration_num, description, create_id, update_id, create_time, update_time, status, send_status, u_version ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{activityName}, #{activityCode}, #{sendTime}, #{sendScope}, #{sendAll}, #{activityTools}, #{sendNum}, #{integrationNum}, #{description}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{status}, #{sendStatus}, #{uVersion} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.`name` as 'name', a.phone as 'phone', c.name as 'primaryPerson.name' FROM sys_office a LEFT JOIN biz_order_header b on b.cust_id = a.id and b.status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user c on a.primary_person = c.id and c.`status` = 1 where a.`status` = 1 AND a.type = 6 and b.cust_id is not null GROUP BY b.cust_id
